typed_missingness.NOT_APPLICABLE: Question not relevant to case type

question_mapping.Q33: Legal bases relied upon by defendant

column_descriptions.decision_id: Unique identifier for each DPA decision
column_descriptions.dpa_name_canonical: Standardized name of data protection authority
column_descriptions.decision_year: Year of decision for temporal analysis
column_descriptions.breach_case: Boolean: data breach discussed in decision
column_descriptions.remedy_only_case: Boolean: no fine but corrective measures
column_descriptions.schema_echo_flag: Boolean: AI response contains schema artifacts
column_descriptions.q30_discussed_coverage_status: Article 5 principles discussed (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q30_discussed_status: Article 5 principles discussed (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q30_discussed_exclusivity_conflict: Article 5 principles discussed (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag
column_descriptions.q31_violated_coverage_status: Article 5 principles violated (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q31_violated_status: Article 5 principles violated (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q31_violated_exclusivity_conflict: Article 5 principles violated (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag
column_descriptions.q32_bases_coverage_status: Article 6 legal bases discussed (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q32_bases_status: Article 6 legal bases discussed (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q32_bases_exclusivity_conflict: Article 6 legal bases discussed (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag
column_descriptions.q53_powers_coverage_status: Article 58(2) corrective powers exercised (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q53_powers_status: Article 58(2) corrective powers exercised (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q53_powers_exclusivity_conflict: Article 58(2) corrective powers exercised (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag
column_descriptions.q56_rights_discussed_coverage_status: Data subject rights discussed (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q56_rights_discussed_status: Data subject rights discussed (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q56_rights_discussed_exclusivity_conflic: Data subject rights discussed (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag
column_descriptions.q57_rights_violated_coverage_status: Data subject rights violated (binary indicators) - overall status
column_descriptions.q57_rights_violated_status: Data subject rights violated (binary indicators) - derived legal status
column_descriptions.q57_rights_violated_exclusivity_conflict: Data subject rights violated (binary indicators) - conflicting options flag

usage_notes: Use country_group and decision_year for efficient filtering
Boolean columns use pandas nullable boolean dtype
Empty strings converted to null for Parquet compatibility
Consult validation_report.json for data quality issues
